import React, { useState } from "react"; import '../Style/AreaDetalles.css' const AreaDetalles = (props) => { const [Normal, setNormal] = useState(true); const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(true); const hadleClickNormal = () => {setNormal(true);}; const hadleClickShiny = () => {setNormal(false);}; const handleClose = () => {setShowDetails(false)}; return (
{showDetails && (

#  {props.id}.

{props.name}

{Normal ? () : () }

{props.types}

{props.type2}

Ability: Hidden Ability: Height: Weight:
{props.ability} {props.hiddenAbility} {props.height} {props.weight}

Pokemon's Stats

HP: {props.hp} ATK: {props.atk} Def: {props.def} SPATK:{props.spAtk} SPDEF: {props.spDef} Speed: {props.speed}
)}
); } export default AreaDetalles;
